name: Cronos DR17 Theme
short_description:
This will be the Port of the Cronos-Theme from Enlightenment DR16 to Enlightenment DR17.
The Original Theme from Enlightenment DR16 is GPL licenced and was build by Martin Sobotka. http://themes.freshmeat.net/projects/cronos/
